items.title: Bee Quest
items.description: Bee Quest, is an asymmetric game optimized for HMD and Mobile, immersing players into the enchanting realm of the Honey Bee.
items.banner: { "src" : "/images/portfolio/games/BeeQuest/banner.jpg", "alt":"A 3d rendering of many cubes like Minecraft." }

items.title: Crystalline Bliss
items.description: A unique 3D puzzle game that takes place inside many voxel worlds.
items.banner: { "src" : "/images/portfolio/games/CrystallineBliss/banner.jpg", "alt":"A 3d rendering of many cubes like Minecraft." }

items.title: Dream Space Infinite
items.description: A trippy voxel world to explore in your browser.

items.title: Infinite Realm Runner
items.description: An infinite runner game made with TypeScript and BabylonJs.

items.title: Orbital Drift
items.description: A fun gravity based platforming game in Unity.
